price: Menkorͻfoͻ, adεn na merefrε mo akͻ nkwagyeε mu na morefrε me akͻ egya mu?
arabic: ۞ وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَا لِيٓ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلنَّجَوٰةِ وَتَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi mā lī adʿūkum ilā al-najati watadʿūnanī ilā al-nāri
